SocialMediaPosting.headline: Dr. Stephen L. Gage’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I would like everyone to be nice to each other, for every person to do his or her best, no matter the task, and for everyone to LOVE MUSIC…”

– Dr. Stephen L. Gage, Director of Bands & Orchestra @youngstownstate https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/everyone-nice-do-his-her-best-love-music/
